plugin.name: l33t_hunttrick
plugin.author: Ruhamah
plugin.description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ l33t_template_lua (v0.01) by Ruhamah (https://aard.l33t.xyz)
l33t Hunt Trick
The Hunt Trick is used especially during campaigns when there are multiple mobs in the area with the same name, but only one or a few of those mobs are the campaign mob target.
For example, if the target is 'princess', this plugin will automatically send:
'hunt 1.princess' 'hunt 2.princess' 'hunt 3.princess' ... 'hunt n.princess'
Until the campaign target is detected.
See 'help hunt trick'.
Usage:
l33t hunt [help] - Displays help lhunt [help]
ht <target> - Starts the hunt trick sequence
lhunt <on|off> - Enable or disable this plugin
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

muclient.triggers:
<trigger enabled="y" group="l33t_hunt" match="^(?P.*) is here!$" name="l33t_hunt_here" omit_from_output="n" regexp="y" script="lhunt_here" sequence="100" >
<trigger enabled="y" group="l33t_hunt" match="^You are certain that (?P.*) is (?P.*) from here\.$" name="l33t_hunt_certain" omit_from_output="n" regexp="y" script="lhunt_mob_dir" sequence="100" >
<trigger enabled="y" group="l33t_hunt" match="^You are confident that (?P.*) passed through here, heading (?P.*)\.$" name="l33t_hunt_confident" omit_from_output="n" regexp="y" script="lhunt_mob_dir" sequence="100" >
<trigger enabled="y" group="l33t_hunt" match="^You have no idea what you're doing, but maybe (?P.*) is (?P.*)\?$" name="l33t_hunt_no_idea" omit_from_output="n" regexp="y" script="lhunt_mob_dir" sequence="100" >
<trigger enabled="y" group="l33t_hunt" match="^You couldn't find a path to (?P.*) from here\.$" name="l33t_hunt_path_not_found" omit_from_output="n" regexp="y" script="lhunt_path_not_found" sequence="100" >
muclient.aliases: <alias enabled="y" group="l33t_hunt" match="^ *ht +(?P.*) *" regexp="y" script="ht_start" sequence="100" >
muclient.script:
-- See: https://github.com/fiendish/aardwolfclientpackage/wiki/Using-GMCP require "gmcphelper" -- adds the gmcp() function for simplifying data access
-- Globals
PLUGIN_ID = GetPluginID() PLUGIN_NAME = GetPluginInfo(PLUGIN_ID, 1) PLUGIN_AUTHOR = GetPluginInfo(PLUGIN_ID, 2) PLUGIN_VERSION = GetPluginInfo(PLUGIN_ID, 19) PLUGIN_NUM_TRIGGERS = GetPluginInfo(PLUGIN_ID, 9) PLUGIN_NUM_ALIASES = GetPluginInfo(PLUGIN_ID, 10) PLUGIN_NUM_TIMERS = GetPluginInfo(PLUGIN_ID, 11)
PLUGIN_URL = 'https://aard.l33t.xyz'
-- Other plugins PLUGIN_ID_GMCP_HANDLER = '3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264' PLUGIN_ID_DINV = '88c86ea252fc1918556df9fe' PLUGIN_ID_L33T_LUA_UTILS = '13376f198e8f442baa0be9a6'
-- Script Locals
local LHUNT_ENABLED = true local LHUNT_HUNTTRICK_TARGET = nil local LHUNT_HUNTTRICK_COUNTER = 0 local LHUNT_HUNTTRICK_IN_PROGRESS = false
local currentRoomInfo = nil
function handleGMCP(text) --[[ Room Format:
{ ['details'] = 'safe', ['name'] = 'The Grand City of Aylor', ['num'] = '32418', ['exits'] = { ['s'] = '32419', ['u'] = '35200', ['d'] = '32615', ['w'] = '30518', ['n'] = '32539', ['e'] = '32698' }, ['terrain'] = 'aylorcity', ['coord'] = { ['y'] = '20', ['x'] = '30', ['cont'] = '0', ['id'] = '0' }, ['outside'] = '0', ['zone'] = 'aylor' }
--]]
if text == 'room.info' then local roomInfo = gmcp('room.info') if roomInfo ~= nil then currentRoomInfo = roomInfo end end end
-- Extensions
table.reduce = function (list, fn) local acc for k, v in ipairs(list) do if 1 == k then acc = v else acc = fn(acc, v) end end return acc end
function sum(a, b) return a + b end
-- Core Functions
function lhunt_on() LHUNT_ENABLED = true Note('l33t hunt enabled') end
function lhunt_off() LHUNT_ENABLED = false Note('l33t hunt disabled') end
function ht_start(name, line, wildcards) local target = GetAliasWildcard(name, 'mob') LHUNT_HUNTTRICK_TARGET = target LHUNT_HUNTTRICK_COUNTER = 0 LHUNT_HUNTTRICK_ACTIVE = true ht_iter() end
function build_cur_target() local target = LHUNT_HUNTTRICK_COUNTER .. '.' .. LHUNT_HUNTTRICK_TARGET return target end
function ht_iter() LHUNT_HUNTTRICK_COUNTER = LHUNT_HUNTTRICK_COUNTER + 1 local target = build_cur_target() Execute('hunt ' .. target) end
function lhunt_unable_to_hunt() LHUNT_HUNTTRICK_ACTIVE = false local target = build_cur_target() Execute('where ' .. target) end
function lhunt_here() if LHUNT_HUNTTRICK_ACTIVE then ht_iter() end end
function lhunt_not_here() LHUNT_HUNTTRICK_TARGET = nil LHUNT_HUNTTRICK_COUNTER = 0 LHUNT_HUNTTRICK_ACTIVE = false end
function lhunt_move_dir(raw_dir) local dir_map = { ['north'] = 'n', ['south'] = 's', ['east'] = 'e', ['west'] = 'w', ['up'] = 'u', ['down'] = 'd', }
if LHUNT_ENABLED then local dir = dir_map[raw_dir] Execute(dir) end end
function lhunt_mob_dir(name, line, wildcards) local mob = GetAliasWildcard(name, 'mob') local dir = GetAliasWildcard(name, 'dir')
if LHUNT_HUNTTRICK_ACTIVE then ht_iter() else lhunt_move_dir(dir) end
end
function lhunt_path_not_found() if LHUNT_HUNTTRICK_ACTIVE then ht_iter() end end
-- Help
function OnHelp (sName, sLine, wildcards) Note(GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 3)) end
-- Plugin Lifecycle
function OnPluginInstall() printSeparator() ColourTell( 'CornFlowerBlue', '', ( 'Loaded ' .. PLUGIN_NAME .. ' (v' .. PLUGIN_VERSION .. ')' .. ' by ' .. PLUGIN_AUTHOR .. ' (' ) ) printPluginLink() ColourTell( 'CornFlowerBlue', '', ( ').\n' .. 'Loaded ' .. PLUGIN_NUM_TRIGGERS .. ' triggers, ' .. PLUGIN_NUM_ALIASES .. ' aliases, ' .. PLUGIN_NUM_TIMERS .. ' timers.\n\n' ), 'CornFlowerBlue', '', 'Type "', 'MediumSeaGreen', '', 'l33t hunt help', 'CornFlowerBlue', '', '".\n' ) printSeparator() end
function OnPluginSaveState() end
function OnPluginBroadcast(msg, id, name, text) if id == PLUGIN_ID_GMCP_HANDLER then handleGMCP(text) elseif id == PLUGIN_ID_L33T_LUA_UTILS then -- placeholder else -- do nothing, unrecognized plugin end end
-- Util Functions
function printSeparator() ColourTell( 'CornFlowerBlue', '', '~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\n' ) end
function printPluginLink() Hyperlink(PLUGIN_URL, PLUGIN_URL, '', '', '', 1) end
function getDurationString(duration) local seconds = duration local hours = math.floor(seconds / 3600) seconds = seconds - (hours * 3600) local minutes = math.floor(seconds / 60) seconds = seconds - (minutes * 60)
local durationString = '' if hours > 0 then durationString = durationString .. hours .. ' hours' end
if minutes > 0 then if string.len(durationString) > 0 then durationString = durationString .. ', ' end durationString = durationString .. minutes .. ' minutes' end
if seconds > 0 then if string.len(durationString) > 0 then durationString = durationString .. ', ' end durationString = durationString .. seconds .. ' seconds' end
return durationString end
